Keanu Allridge
Home Projects Contact

Projects

  • Writely

    A journaling API written in C# and ASP.NET Core. It features a simple membership system implemented with Identity, and data persistence handled with Entity Framework Core.

  • Flash Cards

    An API for managing a collection of flash cards. It is written in Python, using the Flask framework, together with Flask-RESTful. Data persistence is handled with Flask-SQLAlchemy.

  • Address Book

    A full stack JavaScript app for managing a list of contacts. Runs Express.js on the back end, with data persistence handled by MongoDB (Mongoose). Authentication is handled by Passport.js. The front end is ReactJS, styled in Sass.
